modName: No Equip and Drop Sound from menu also silent Unarmed draw and sheathe
summary: no more annoying clicks or generic sound bytes
descriptionHtml:
This removes the sounds for equipping/unequipping and dropping generic items, armours and weapons using the items menu or quick list; falling items, blocking and normal weapon draw/sheathe sounds untouched.

Installation:
Simply extract files into the /Skyrim/Data folder and overwrite anything if necessary.

Optional file available for no sound for \"drawing/sheathing\" unarmed.  Does it make a sound when you ball your fists?  I know that my hands don\'t.
author: mrjentipede

files.name: no more equip or drop sounds
files.fileName: no more equip or drop sounds-29685-1.zip

files.name: no more arm or sheathe unarmed
files.fileName: no more arm or sheathe unarmed-29685-1.zip
